text:
[Verse]
Gotta step outside
Feel the cool breeze
Hear the thunder roar
It's a symphony

[Verse 2]
Splash in puddles
Jump in the street
Lightning sparks above
Heart skips a beat

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No need to explain
Just lose yourself
Let go
In the storm's flow

[Verse 3]
Feet on the pavement
Hands to the sky
Raindrops on my face
Laughter's high

[Bridge]
It's the rhythm of life
Wash away all the strife
Just you and the rain
No more pain

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No need to explain
Just lose yourself
Let go
In the storm's flow
title: Dancing in the Rain
